metadata.metaValue:
Implementation of: Vector-Projection Approach to Curve Framing for Extruded Surfaces

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1UI_eq0zQ9XCl3pgs6bEZoVj7C29rEE2-/view?usp=sharing
Project current normal onto the next frame.
Calculate an average point scale to draw the transform axis. The result size is the average relative segment length divided by two.
Erase properties to prevent instancing to use scale from geo properties
